name: Raijin Storm
description:
Summary

Raijin Storm is a 2D side scrolling platform shooter with some melee combat and tower defence mechanisms, I created this game with inspirations taken from the Megaman, Contra, Street Fighter and Okami. The game is centered around the ability to shoot in a complete 360 range, The player must defend the castle wall and fight off enemy waves. How long can you survive?.

Key Features

- Shooting in a 360 radius 

- Melee Combat

- Reflective Enemy Shields 

- 4 Hit Combos

- Survival Wave System
